import re

def count_words(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    words = text.split()
    word_count = len(words)
    return word_count

import re

def count_words(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text)
    words = text.split()
    word_count = len(words)
    return word_count
